main.name: Sahidul Arif
main.description: I like to code things from scratch, and enjoy bringing ideas to life in the browser
main.contactmessage: Have me make stuff for you. If you like my work and have some cool projects to work on, just send me a direct message or contact me through social sites.

education.description: The first year required the study of foundations of mathematics, physics, computer science, computer networks and electronics. The second year required the study of advanced mathematics and physics, and the fundamentals of electronic systems.

testimonials.text: Arif has a great mentality that always seeks to improve his skills. His discipline makes working with him easy and challenging at the same time. He loves to share his ideas and accomplishments with other people, which makes him very easily leave an impact in any working environment.
testimonials.user: Rezaul Karim Hassan | Product Manager - Front-End Developer on JavaScript/React.js

testimonials.text: I worked with Arif at Programming Hero. Alexandra is detailed orientated, has advanced system engineering and problem-solving skills. He has the ability to effectively manage several tasks at a time.
testimonials.user: Jhankar Mahbub | CEO of Programming Hero
